tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/editzhirose)** | **[Website](http://www.editz.jp/)**

**Hirose Kiyoshi** is a Japanese editor and film editor.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/東潤一)

Founder and representative director of Studio Easter.
__Keiji Oota__ is a Japanese producer and animation planner. Managing Director at Toho.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/horiken2000)

Founder and representative director of [P.A. Works](https://anilist.co/studio/132/).

Hiroo Maruyama is a producer working for Mainichi Broadcasting System (MBS).

He joined Mainichi Broadcasting in 1999. Was transferred later to the Tokyo office and took over duties relating to the production of animation broadcasts. He was responsible for production on series like Gundam Seed, Gundam Seed Destiny and Full Metal Alchemist, all part of the 6:00pm Saturday timeblock, which gained wide popularity.
Chidori Hayashi is the representative director of Medicos Entertainment.
**Akito Takahashi** is a publicity producer working for Toho.
Masaya Saitou is a producer and publicity manager.
Masaya Saitou is a producer and publicity manager.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/michi1020)

Mitsuhito Tsuji is a producer for P.A. Works.
